
                            
                            <p> <br>  <br>  <br> 电视柜到顶，做一个开放格 手机充电 <br>  <br> 餐边柜做到顶 放豆浆机、微波炉 之类，厨房太小 只能放这。 <br>  <br> 门口的鞋柜想装旋转鞋架，再做开放格就影响进门采光了<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/194019bjf73zxjlrizn3gr.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/194019bjf73zxjlrizn3gr.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/194833jkir40kbyd0bd7yb.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/194833jkir40kbyd0bd7yb.png"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/195102bal91rhs9c79e2fc.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/195102bal91rhs9c79e2fc.png"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/195148w0h78i5wnh8f085n.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/195148w0h78i5wnh8f085n.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/195203vhthp56emefm2fh5.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/01/195203vhthp56emefm2fh5.png"> <br> </p><p class="pl">专业的事交给专业的人来做</p><p></p>
